name: Bear Sword
description:
Inspired by Tony Hawk pro skater.

  • WASD or Joystick to steer
  • Space or A to accelerate
  • Shift or X to boost
  • Tab or Y to toggle compass home
  • Q/E or LB/RB to rotate in the air

Goal: Break all the boxes and steal the honey to unlock 9 collectible letters! 

Credits

  • Game Stuff: Ursagames
  • Music: TinyViking
  • BaseWater: https://www.habrador.com/tutorials/unity-boat-tutorial/

Made in 34 hours for WWUJAM XI!
